title: Kylie Jenner's ex-boyfriend Tyga references viral 'rise and shine' clip
text:
Just a day after her singing skills went viral, Kylie Jenner got a shout out from her ex-boyfriend Tyga.

The 22 year old reality star and cosmetics mogul was giving a video tour of her Kylie Cosmetics company when she woke her one and a half year old daughter Stormi.

She woke her daughter with a melodic, 'Rise and shine,' with Tyga seemingly acknowledging her chops on an Instagram post.

Viral: Just a day after her singing skills went viral, Kylie Jenner got a shout out from her ex-boyfriend Tyga

Tyga shared a photo of his orange and black tiger-inspired Ferrari, with the caption reading simply 'Rise n shine.

Jenner herself hasn't commented on the comment from Tyga, who she dated from 2014 to 2017.

However, she did take to her Instagram to capitalize on the Rise and Shine viral sensation with new hoodies for sale on her website.

No comment: Jenner herself hasn't commented on the comment from Tyga, who she dated from 2014 to 2017

Jenner shared two photos on Instagram of two different hoodies, both featuring 'Rise and Shine.'

One of the hoodies is black, with 'Riiise' on one arm and 'Shiiinnee' on the other, with a photo of Jenner with a sun outline around it.

The other hoodie is white, with 'Riiise and Shiiinnee' in pink lettering plus a number of black musical notes and the same Jenner sun image.

Black hoodie: One of the hoodies is black, with 'Riiise' on one arm and 'Shiiinnee' on the other, with a photo of Jenner with a sun outline around it

Both hoodies cost $65, with all orders shipping between four and five weeks from the date of purchase.

Shortly after her singing skills were put on display, Ariana Grande started singing Rise and Shine on her Instagram story, asking Jenner if she could 'sample' her track.

Jenner responded, agreeing to let it be sampled, but only if Grande allowed her to star in the music video.

Cost: Both hoodies cost $65, with all orders shipping between four and five weeks from the date of purchase

Jenner is coming off her surprising break-up of Travis Scott, who she has dated for two and a half years, directly after her split with Tyga.

Kylie and Travis share their year and a half year old daughter Stormi, who Jenner was waking up in that now-viral video.

Both Jenner and Scott have been seen together recently, though there is no word on whether they are reconciling or not.

Split: Jenner is coming off her surprising break-up of Travis Scott, who she has dated for two and a half years, directly after her split with Tyga
description: Just a day after her singing skills went viral, Kylie Jenner got a shout out from her ex-boyfriend Tyga.
